A Night of Tricks, Treats & Terrors

The gates of Nightmare Manor are open. Book your visit and uncover what lurks inside.

Explore the Unknown

The Haunted Halls

Where Whispers Never Fade Step into endless corridors that echo with voices from the past. Every flicker of candlelight may reveal a shadow that isn’t yours.

The Cursed Chambers

Dreams Turn Into Nightmares Rooms frozen in time… and haunted by those who never checked out. Don’t linger too long, or you might become part of the furniture.

The Forgotten Cellar

Darkness Holds Its Secrets A place the Manor never wanted you to find. The air is damp, the silence unbearable… and the scratching sound? Definitely not the pipes.

Meet the Manor’s Inhabitants

Step inside Nightmare Manor, but beware… you are not the only ones wandering these haunted halls. Madame Nocturne, the fortune teller, peers into her crystal ball and whispers the fate that awaits each visitor. She may smile or vanish before your eyes. Baron Blackwood, the Manor’s ghostly host, still roams the halls, making sure guests are properly frightened.

Granny Grim, keeper of the cellar, knows every hidden passage and is not shy about giving you a very hands-on welcome if you wander too far. And beware The Whispering Twins, mischievous spirits whose giggles echo through the corridors. They might lead you into a trap or to the Manor’s hidden candy stash.
